item.title: The Future Of Data Science In Digital Marketing
How A Youtube comment made Paytm change its official name on Twitter
item.description: Binod. A Youtube comment that made the news. A Youtube comment that ruled the internet. A Youtube comment that made Paytm change its official username on Twitter. Binod. Can it get any further? I guess not. Where did it all start? Well, A popular YouTube channel Slayy Point released a video “ğ—ªğ—µğ˜† ğ—œğ—»ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—» ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ğ˜€ ğ—¦ğ—²ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—¶ğ˜€ ğ—šğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¯ğ—®ğ—´ğ—² (ğ—•ğ—œğ—¡ğ—¢ğ——)” showcasing the person by name of Binod Thaur leaving a single comment “Binod” everywhere.
